items.title: Hyundai Q4 FY25: Continues to move in slow lane
items.description: Lower volumes due to weak domestic sentiment weighs on performance.

items.title: Family arrangements in India: Legal backbone of legacy realignments
items.description: Family arrangements offer a sophisticated legal mechanism to engineer inter-generational realignment without disruption. They enable families to navigate the complexities of succession, governance, and business separation in a way that is collaborative, forward-looking, and shielded from public acrimony.

items.title: NCC Limited: Strong order book provides growth visibility
items.description: NCC received record order inflows in Q4FY25 and emerged L1 (lowest bidder) in several projects. It has indicated strong order inflow for FY26, indicating that infrastructure development opportunity remains huge.

items.title: Emami Q4: Higher rural focus helped in better execution
items.description: Rural rebound, seasonal tailwinds drove double-digit growth across core

items.title: Saregama: Building strong IP ecosystem for future music growth
items.description: The company reported strong numbers in FY25; focus intact on content acquisition
